perturbation.original_text: 1.3 "Affiliate" means any distributor or franchisee of HSWI or any company or other entity worldwide, including without limitation corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and limited liability companies in which HSWI directly or indirectly holds at least a 19% ownership, equity, control or financial interest and which HSWI intends to enjoy any of HSWI's rights hereunder. A list of Affiliates as of the Effective Date is attached hereto as Attachment A. Attachment A may be modified from time to time upon notice by HSWI to reflect a revised list of Affiliates and each modified Attachment A shall be deemed incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.3 "Affiliate" means any distributor or franchisee of HSWI or any company or other entity worldwide, including without limitation corporations, partnerships, joint ventures, and limited liability companies in which HSWI directly or indirectly holds at least a 50% ownership, equity, control or financial interest and which HSWI intends to enjoy any of HSWI's rights hereunder. A list of Affiliates as of the Effective Date is attached hereto as Attachment A. Attachment A may be modified from time to time upon notice by HSWI to reflect a revised list of Affiliates and each modified Attachment A shall be deemed incorporated herein by reference.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'Affiliate' now contradicts itself if Attachment A includes entities where HSWI holds between 19% and 49% ownership. This creates ambiguity regarding which entities qualify as Affiliates under the agreement, affecting rights and obligations.

perturbation.original_text: 2.1 License Grant and Restrictions.   (i) License Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, World Book hereby grants to HSWI, a perpetual, irrevocable limited license to use, copy, store, archive, distribute, transmit, modify (subject to Section 2.1(iv)), and Display the Content, Images and Affinities in whole or in part, only on the HSWI Websites or in promotions in any media for the HSWI Websites. The license to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be subject to the term and exclusivity provisions set forth in this Section 2. The license to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be supplemented by any additional license rights in this Section 2, and in the event of any conflict with this Section 2.1 such other additional license rights in this Section 2 shall prevail.
perturbation.changed_text: 2.1 License Grant and Restrictions.   (i) License Grant. Subject to the terms and conditions set forth herein, World Book hereby grants to HSWI, a license to use, copy, store, archive, distribute, transmit, modify (subject to Section 2.1(iv)), and Display the Content, Images and Affinities in whole or in part, only on the HSWI Websites or in promotions in any media for the HSWI Websites. The license to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be subject to the term and exclusivity provisions set forth in this Section 2. The license to each component of the Content, Images and Affinities shall be supplemented by any additional license rights in this Section 2, and in the event of any conflict with this Section 2.1 such other additional license rights in this Section 2 shall prevail.
perturbation.explanation: Removing 'perpetual, irrevocable limited' conflicts with section 2.2(iii) which states 'The term of the license for the Content delivered to HSWI as part of the Affinities, and the Affinities themselves, shall be perpetual, Exclusive, and irrevocable.' The absence of these terms in section 2.1 creates uncertainty on whether or not to apply the limited definition or the definition with `perpetual, Exclusive, and irrevocable`.

perturbation.changed_text:
8.3 World Book's Representations and Warranties. World Book hereby represents and warrants that:
   (i) it has all applicable rights in and to the Content and the Content does not and will not infringe or misappropriate any Intellectual Property Rights of any third persons.
   (ii) it will perform all services in a professional, diligent, and workmanlike manner.

   In the event of a breach of the foregoing warranties, and without limitation to any other remedies of HSWI, World Book shall promptly remedy the breach at no additional cost or expense to HSWI.

8.4 Disclaimer. EXCEPT AS SET FORTH IN THIS AGREEMENT, NEITHER PARTY MAKES ANY OTHER REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, AS TO THE ACCURACY OR COMPLETENESS OF THE CONTENT.  TO THE FULL EXTENT ALLOWED BY APPLICABLE LAW, EACH PARTY DISCLAIMS ALL OTHER WARRANTIES, WHETHER EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR USE OR PURPOSE.
perturbation.explanation: By removing specific warranties related to the content's accuracy, compliance with Chinese regulations, and government approval, section 8.3 contradicts the broad disclaimer in section 8.4.  The explicit warranties create a guarantee, while the disclaimer aims to negate all other warranties. This conflict makes it unclear if HSWI can rely on the specific guarantees about content accuracy and legality.
